description: This file implements functions for managing TLS handshake sessions within a TLS Session Manager Object. It includes functions to select, retrieve, add, delete specific, and delete all handshake sessions, operating as part of the TLS protocol implementation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsSmoHsmSelHandshakeSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG host_id,ULONG peer_id,ULONG conn_end,ANSC_HANDLE hSessionState)
methods.description: Selects a handshake session by matching host ID, peer ID, and connection end, returning the session state if found.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsSmoHsmGetHandshakeSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG host_id,ULONG peer_id,PUCHAR session_id,ULONG session_id_size,ANSC_HANDLE hSessionState)
methods.description: Retrieves a handshake session matching host ID, peer ID, and session ID; returns session state if found.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsSmoHsmAddHandshakeSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSessionState)
methods.description: Adds a new handshake session to the session manager.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsSmoHsmDelHandshakeSession(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG host_id,ULONG peer_id,PUCHAR session_id,ULONG session_id_size)
methods.description: Deletes a handshake session matching host ID, peer ID, and session ID.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsSmoHsmDelAllHandshakeSessions(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Deletes all handshake sessions managed by the session manager.

ctags.name: TlsSmoHsmGetHandshakeSession
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG host_id,ULONG peer_id,PUCHAR session_id,ULONG session_id_size,ANSC_HANDLE hSessionState)
